subject: Final Attempt : You May have a check coming
body:
We have checks ready to send you for offering us your honest opinion on various online surveys that only take a few minutes to complete. So if you're interested in earning a nice extra income each month for just giving your opinion on various surveys then press here to begin:

http://planembark.com/t/q0wde.2lp/600026

-----

To Unsubscribe from future SurveyClub emails use this link:

http://planembark.com/t/q0wde.2lp/600027

During the removal period, you may receive some invitations that were already in process when your request was received. To Unsubscribe via U.S. Mail please send all inquiries to: 
SurveyClub, 
#425 3210 E Chinden Blvd #115, 
Eagle, 
ID 83616.


 
Hi Subscriber! You are receiving this solicitation because producttestpanel@speedy.uwaterloo.ca previously agreed to receive correspondence from ELongView. If this service should fail to meet your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from our service.
http://planembark.com/u/144a/producttestpanel%40speedy.uwaterloo.ca/2

Should you want to contact us via the United States Postal Service, our address is as follows:
370 W. Pleasantview Ave Suite 206 Hackensack, NJ 7061
